The Compassionate Choice For Seniors and Cancer Patients

Delivering Comfort and Care on Every Ride

CareRide is a compassionate and convenient transportation service that helps seniors and cancer patients get the essentials they need, without the hassle of driving or relying on others.

Professional & Certified

Affordable Prices

+1 (877) 368-3569

Book a Ride and Enjoy the Journey

At Veloxy CareRide, we provide a range of services designed to support seniors and cancer patients in their daily lives. Our offerings include:

Store shopping

CareRide will pick up seniors and cancer patients from their homes and take them to their preferred grocery store(s) of choice, helping them stock up on essential items.

Hourly Rentals

CareRide will provide transportation to and from various stores, such as pharmacies, department stores, and specialty shops, allowing seniors and cancer patients to run errands with ease.

Medical appointments

CareRide can also provide transportation to and from medical appointments, such as chemotherapy sessions, doctor’s visits, and lab tests.

Our Features

Veloxy CareRide is dedicated to providing an exceptional transportation experience, ensuring the highest quality of service through these key features:

Flexible scheduling

CareRide will offer flexible scheduling options to accommodate the needs of seniors and cancer patients, including early morning, late evening, and weekend appointments.

Trustworthy drivers

All CareRide drivers will undergo thorough background checks and training to ensure a safe and trustworthy experience for passengers.

Comfortable vehicles

CareRide will use comfortable, wheelchair-accessible vehicles to ensure a smooth and comfortable ride for all passengers.

Personalized service

CareRide will work closely with seniors and cancer patients to understand their specific needs and preferences, providing personalized service tailored to their unique requirements.

The Compassionate Choice For Seniors and Cancer Patients.
